Name: Game Of The Dead
About the game: If you are considering purchasing a game that is a work in progress, be aware that it may have bugs or unfinished features and that the frequency of updates may change. Your purchase supports the development of the game and helps shape its future. Research the game and developer before making a purchase and be aware of any terms and conditions and refund policies. In Game Of The Dead, a terrifying twin-stick auto-shooter, you must fight for your life against relentless hordes of zombies. With rich, minimalistic gameplay and a unique deck-building roguelike system, you'll need to power up your character and collect zombie souls to craft and build powerful weapons and abilities. As you progress, you'll also be able to build and upgrade your base to protect yourself from the never-ending waves of undead. Can you survive the night and escape the zombies in Nathan Prince's GAME OF THE DEAD? Play now and find out!
